sources.title: Christmas Town | Full Movie | Christmas Fantasy | Happy Holidays
sources.description:
Christmas Town - A cynical workaholic gets suspicious of her banker father's sudden departure from his career and city life to move to a small town with unusually strong ties to Christmas.
2008.  Stars: Nicole de Boer, Patrick Muldoon, Gig Morton

metadata.Plot: On her way to a new job as teacher, Lauren stops in Grandon Falls, where she meets and befriends single handyman Travis, his foster kid and many other locals in the weeks up to Christmas.
metadata.Writer: Donna VanLiere, Wesley Bishop, Donald Martin
metadata.Actors: Candace Cameron Bure, Tim Rozon, Beth Broderick
